title: Shichiri Beach in Sagami Province (S么sh没 shichiri-ga-hama), from the series Thirty-Six Views of Mount Fuji (Fugaku sanj没rokkei)
description: The print is designed in blue, gree and white.  An irregular rocky peninsula juts out from the right with clumps of trees rising against the distant snowy mass of Fuji.  Young pines on the foreground hill.  White clouds contrast with the deep blue of the horizon.  Blue outline.
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of the Friends of Arthur B. Duel
medium: Ukiyo-e woodblock print in "么ban" format; ink and color on paper
